channel.title: Bare Metal Cloud Status - Incident History

item.title: [SGP][Virtual Private Servers] - Network maintenance notification
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jul 29, 07:00 - 09:00 UTC

Jul 10, 18:05 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, we will be carrying out a maintenance on our network infrastructure in the VPS region SGP.

Start time : 29/07/2025 07:00 UTC
End time : 29/07/2025 09:00 UTC
Service impact : The network of all VPS located in the region SGP will observe up to 2 seconds of packet loss. The packet loss will happen once per service during the maintenance window.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing a maintenance on our network infrastructure.


Thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [RBX][Dedicated Servers] - Room W31 Maintenance notification
item.description:

Start time : 28/07/2025 18:00 UTC
End time : 01/08/2025 02:00 UTC
Service impact : Public network will be unreachable on room W31 during the maintenance
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, our teams will be doing a maintenance on multiple network equipment to improve general performance.

Thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [RBX6][Dedicated Servers] - Racks 46D17 / 46D20 / 46D21 / 46D22 / 46D23 /46D25
item.description:
Jul 16, 14:33 UTC
Resolved - We are pleased to inform you that the incident affecting our Dedicated Servers offering has been resolved.

Start time : 15/07/2025 00:44 UTC
End time : 16/07/2025 14:20 UTC
Root Cause : This incident was caused by a cooling system issue.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Jul 15, 15:32 UTC

Please find below an update on the situation:
Update : Rack 46D17 was affected by this incident, all servers have been operational since 15/07/2025 14:46 UTC.
Ongoing Actions : Our teams are always ready to restore your services as quickly as possible.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Jul 15, 12:18 UTC
Update - We have new information regarding the incident that affected your service(s).

Please find below an update on the situation:
Update : Servers in rack 46D23 are operational again.
Ongoing Actions : Our team is fixing the remaining servers.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.
We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Jul 15, 04:29 UTC
Update - We have new information regarding the incident that affected your service(s).

Please find below an update on the situation:
Update : Since 15/07/2025 04:04 UTC, servers in rack 46D23 and 46D25 are temporarily unavailable.
Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and our teams are mobilised to restore service as quickly as possible.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.
We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Jul 15, 00:59 UTC
Identified - We have determined the origin of the incident affecting our Dedicated Servers offering on the racks 46D20 / 46D21 and 46D22.

Here is detail for this incident :
Start time : 15/07/2025 00:44 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : Some servers in the specified racks are temporarily unavailable.
Customers Impact : Customers are temporarily unable to access their servers located on the specified racks.
Root Cause : This incident is caused by a cooling system issue.
Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and our teams are mobilised to restore service as quickly as possible.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.
We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

item.title: [RBX/SBG][Storage and Backups] - NAS HA maintenance notification
item.description:
Jul 16, 08:20 UTC
Completed - The current maintenance has been canceled and she will be rescheduled later.

Jul 16, 04:30 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Jun 30, 17:49 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Bare Metal Cloud offer.

Start time : 16/07/2025 04:30 UTC
End time : 16/07/2025 10:00 UTC
Service impact : Impacted services might experience some input/output freezes for storage equipment during the maintenance.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will perform an update on the storage servers hosting your data.
This version will improve certain security mechanisms, as well as some performance enhancements.
During the maintenance period, your data will remain available.

Thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [GRA3][Virtual Private Servers] - Workflow Management service maintenance notification
item.description:
Jul 16, 07:22 UTC
Completed - We are sorry to inform you that this maintenance is postponed to another date. We will keep you updated as soon as the date is fixed.

Jul 15, 20:25 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Workflow Management service, Mistral.

Here are the details of the maintenance:
Start time : 16/07/2025 08:00 UTC
End time : 16/07/2025 10:00 UTC
Service impact : During this maintenance window for the Workflow Management service (Mistral), you may encounter the following impacts :

Workflows in progress at the start of the maintenance will be stopped and will be restarted automatically after the maintenance is completed. We understand that this may cause a temporary disruption in your workflow processing, and we apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
Cron triggers (scheduled workflow executions) during the maintenance period will not be triggered. If you have any workflows scheduled to run during the maintenance window, we recommend rescheduling them to run outside of this timeframe to avoid any disruption.

Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be performing a maintenance on the Mistral service infrastructure. This maintenance is necessary to ensure the continued reliability and performance of our platform.

If you have any questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to reach out to our support team.
